channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado has appeared in Oslo, Norway, after winning the Nobel Peace Prize, waving from the balcony of a hotel after months in hiding. #Venezuela #MariaCorinaMachado #NobelPeacePrize #NobelPrize #Norway #Oslo #BBCN
item.description: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado has appeared in Oslo, Norway, after winning the Nobel Peace Prize, waving from the balcony of a hotel after months in hiding. #Venezuela #MariaCorinaMachado #NobelPeacePrize #NobelPrize #Norway #Oslo #BBCN

item.title: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado, who has been in hiding for months, has told the BBC that she knows "exactly the risks" she's taking by travelling to Norway to collect her Nobel Peace Prize. #Venezuela #NobelPeacePrize #MaríaCorinaMachad
item.description: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado, who has been in hiding for months, has told the BBC that she knows "exactly the risks" she's taking by travelling to Norway to collect her Nobel Peace Prize. #Venezuela #NobelPeacePrize #MaríaCorinaMachad

item.title: A group of children spotted 15-year-old Adel’s body on their way to school. He’d been shot in the head, and set on fire. He was the latest in a series of murders linked to Marseille’s drug wars. #Marseille #France #News #BBCNews

item.title: Four men gained entry to a building in the Cumberland Basin area of the city in the early hours of 25 September, Avon and Somerset Police said, before stealing the items of "of significant cultural value". #Bristol #Museum #Crime #Somerset #BBCNews

item.title: He was sent to a prison in El Salvador earlier this year, which the US government later admitted was in error. He was returned to the US to face human smuggling charges and has been held since then. #USNews #KilmarAbregoGarcia #ElSalvador #BreakingNews #B

item.title: US forces have seized an oil tanker off the coast of Venezuela, in a sharp escalation of Washington's pressure campaign against the country's government. The country is home to some the world's largest proven oil reserves. #Venezuela #SouthAmerica #Nicolá
item.description: US forces have seized an oil tanker off the coast of Venezuela, in a sharp escalation of Washington's pressure campaign against the country's government. The country is home to some the world's largest proven oil reserves. #Venezuela #SouthAmerica #Nicolá

item.title: The footage of killer whales and Pacific white-sided dolphins near the coast of British Columbia, Canada, is the first recorded evidence of the two species working together, researchers said. #Whales #Dolphins #BritishColumbia #Canada #Sealife #BBCNews

item.title: The Gold Card scheme promises US residency in "record time" and Donald Trump says it is "going to create jobs". However some Democrats have criticised the scheme, saying it would unfairly favour wealthy individuals. #DonaldTrump #Immigration #GoldCard #US

item.title: For the entire tournament through to the final, it will cost between £5,225 to £12,357 for one person to go to all eight matches. Fifa has not yet commented on its pricing decisions. #WorldCup2026 #Fifa #Football #News #BBCNews

item.title: A BBC investigation into Chinese disciplinary schools found more than 20 former students claiming there was physical punishment. Other survivors say the schools colluded with parents to abduct them, forcing them into military-style training to ‘fix’ them
